content.detailedDescription:
I had pulled up in front of my dentist's office, where i had an appointment for a cleaning.  at exactly 9:15am, i opened my door, and, as i began to rise from the seat, looked up because there was an suv next to me.  i saw the cylinder immediately.  the sky was bright blue and relatively cloudless, as strong winds were blowing that day, and it had hit a period of momentary clearness where i was.

because i had seen a cylinder in october, i was reluctant to admit that one was intruding on the day again, but quickly had to.  absolutely smooth "fuselage", pure white, with a thick black band around the mid-section.  (the one i had seen in october had the band at the first third of the body.)

again, i heard no sound, although i was mindful of wind gusts all around.

bob gardener and i will be speaking soon about the october sighting...And a couple of uncomfortably odd things that have happened to me since...But he has taken on another's case load, and i understand he is swamped.  however, i did email him briefly just now that i would be filing this.

my feeling on seeing this one was, as in the first one, exhasperated, again because i was in a hurry to get a list of things done, and knew this would have to be addressed.  however this time, there was a definite tinge of apprehension.  

i lost sight of the object when it had flown to such a distance that i couldn't see it.
content.summary: White cylinder with broad black band around mid-section;  seemed slightly slower than airplane; straight line flight

content.detailedDescription: As i drove east on us80 i noticed the object suddenly appear to the northeast and pulled over to observe it at the clive exit. it appeared to be triangular with the point downwards.  it was black or dark colored and just hovered over what appeared to be empty mountain ranges.  after observing it for 10 minutes i determined that it was hovering as its size and position relative to the horizon was unchanged. i then resumed driving east on 80 and after a few minutes i saw the color change to be blue/white and seemingly larger.  i could then see thge valley over which it seemed to be hovering and noticed a white factory building just to the west of where it hovered.  i heard no sound when i pulled off to observe it and the highway was not busy so i was able to hear without any audible interference.  this was a very strange thing to see as it was hovering at quite high altitude without and movement that i could discern for over 20 minutes. a few minutes (maybe 5) after i saw the color change to blue/white, it was gone, although i was not looking at it when this occurred but was looking at it seconds before. when the color changed it looked larger or closer and the details where more clear and it looked like an upside down conical shape blueish in color with white highlights
content.summary: As i drove east on us80 i noticed the object suddenly appear to the northeast and pulled over to observe it at the clive exit

content.detailedDescription: Lights in the sky
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I can only quest what i can see on photo. if somebody can get video from camera around parliament of budapest it will be good.
content.summary: One more photo in right side of picture

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car outside of the funeral home and all my family where still inside, the car was facing the woods as i looked up i saw a huge black triangle moving very slowly the craft was very close it was just above the the building there was lights on each corner of the triangle at first they were constant then they began to blink and flash red and yellow as it got right over the the building.. i watched it the whole way until it went across into the other treeline and got out of sight.. and i also took video with my phone but its really unclear
content.summary: Slow black triangle with red blinking lights on the corners

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a walk around the southern end of our rv park on jan 12, 2012. i know the exact time of this event because i timed it. i timed it because i just left the man that was hired to clean my carpet. i was waiting for it to dry. the exact time was 4:11 pm. sevral minutes later i ran into a friend and we chatted for 3-4 minutes (at most). i then continued on my walk. the total distance of this walk is a little less than 1/2 mile.
the route is fairly rectangular. as i was walking along the highway, i was hit by a very strong reflection in the sky off to the south west. i had completed about 80% of the distance of the route. i could see it was about 700-800 hundred feet above the river. it was silver with a dome that had brassy portholes on it. it was about 40-50 feet in diameter. it began to slide slowly to the south. i watched it for about a minute, maybe a few seconds longer before accelerated and disappeared. when i arrived back home, it was 4:33 pm. i was missing about 20 minutes. 
this is exactly one year from the date that i am missing at least 1/2 hour on a routine drive into parker, az. 
this ufo matches the first abduction that has been uncovered through hypnosis in 1955 in new jersey and is covered more thoroughly in my blog.
content.summary: I observed a silver colored ufo with dome and brass colored ports hovering over the colorado river while on a walk around our rv park. i am missing 20 minutes of time.

content.detailedDescription: The craft was silent and emitted blinking lights for several minutes before vanishing in a blur. no emissions or apendiges were observed. it hovered low over the hills to our sw. the was dark and clear.
content.summary: Observed stationary blinking lights for several minutes after dark.

content.detailedDescription: Everynight 4 the past 2 years i have seen ufos sometimes 8-10 sometimes around 100 since april of 2009 and encountered all sorts of diff kind of stuff i wanna talk 2 a professional willing 2 help even 4 pyshical contact nobody will help
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cigar,   Diamond,   Disc,   Flash,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Unknown
content.summary: Its everynight ive seen them every night since aprilof 2009

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my truck heading east on interstate 8 just coming off interstate 10 by casa grande and i noticed just above me to my right what i thought was a plane flying low. when i got closer i noticed that it was not moving or it was moving very slow. as i kept driving i ended up almost right underneath the object. i didn't really have a chance to stop and get a good look or listen for any sound it was making, but it had three lights that made a triangle shape on the bottom. i lost sight of the object as i kept driving so i don't know how long it stayed there.
content.summary: I was driving on i -8 and looked up at what i thought was a plane going to land, but when i got closer i noticed the lights were not flashing and the object was actually not moving.

content.detailedDescription: After the 1996 april nevada encounter making alien eye contact not knowing what had happened truly made me wonder and look up at the skies in a remarkably different way. i had become one of they whom actual know, not they whom wonder... yet everyone in my life whom i told of the event which were few id actually come to share it with, believed me because they know the true kind of person i am. yet, seeing is believing. they can hear words or read text, but seeing is more than believing. its not only feeling the truth, its knowing the truth. it is just so hard for people to understand what i truly saw that night at 11:00 pm to 8:30 am. unless they were me or i had digital video. what i still dont understand is how the night passed to day upon that 3 minute hill... i lost 9 hours of real time while i was driving and observing this craft. it boggles me still and i wonder how is it possible. how do they use or manipulate time and space spinning in one spot to gather the energy to excel at speeds greater than thought.  yet the simple fact is that all i know is i was driving down a 3 minute hill and night turned to day when the craft spun before it took off at 45 degrees and exited our atmosphere. so, some months had passed all all went to rest. i had this fireball inside me it seemed. i just wanted to tell someone that would take my experience and use it for some kind of truth or scientific research. i was afraid, for years i was afraid to speak or even let anyone know that the anonymous report i made was even me. heck, i had a kid to raise and being a single father i had a lot to lose. i was writing music getting global distribution and i was afraid. not only that but its not something you want your employer to find out. you know, what if they think your crazy or something and terminate you while trying to raise a kid all on your own. then later finding out the report i filed as anonymous was published in ufo magazine, i was really scared. my uncle had found it and only in knowing my story revealed it to my mother whom gave it to me. thats how i found out. not by any other means but the story. its been several years now leading to this and i have decided to file these following reports and this is one of them. it has been 15 years now since the 1996 encounter. this stuff is all over the web and i feel safer now to disclose this information...It was september at around 11:00 pm at night 1996. it was 5 months since id seen the craft in that canyon. id ever since been having these radical dreams. dreams of people, places, events, catastrophes, even seeing through animals eyes hunting. i dreamed a lot before but whatever happened to me multiplied it. i had no idea of what to think. everything had seemed to go to rest though. there was a calm finally inside me. i was freed just to know. i had let go of it. my mind had let go and my heart. then one night out of the blue... yeah out of the blue... im laying in bed at around 11:00 pm at night and all is silent in the streets. im living near six mile canyon at the time.  im trying to get to sleep because i have to work in the morning. i hear this noise in the silence. rattle tap tap whirl whirl ring wring beep beep beep rattle rattle...Its in the distance far about a quarter mile off. i didnt think much of it. i opened my eyes for a few seconds then closed them. then it became louder and more apparent it was something different than id ever heard. for some reason immediately i remembered the incident. it was right on my mind. the noise got louder and was maybe a few streets away. i thought, is that a clunker car? no, cars slow down and speed up i realized. this noise was turning street corners holding steady without slowing down nor speeding up at a very rapid speed. then it was in my neighborhood. i recognized the streets it was turning and it was coming fast towards my location. rattle rattle tap tap beep beep beep rattle whirl beep whirl beep...It turned then onto my street. this thing wasnt slowing down what so ever turning street corners. im still laying down quite frightened and my blinds are closed. my sons mom comes in from the living room and she knew the whole experience for what i had told her and she said what the heck is that? i replied, i dont know what it is but im not looking at it! she answered dont look at it! whatever you do, dont look at it! im going back in the living room! screw this! she said. i laid there, it came right outside our bedroom window. it stayed for a few minutes. i felt paralyzed. i wanted to say something to her. i felt like i needed help. i could not move my mouth. i could not move my entire body. rattle rattle tap tap whirl whirl beep beep beep...It had a hold of all my energy. as soon as i thought about the ufo i saw 5 months prior, i mean when that thought entered my mind...The thing took off...It went up every street it came down in a matter of seconds...And was gone. all that was left were dogs barking in the entire neighborhood...And i must have finally dozed off, and awoke to my alarm to go to work. i later thought maybe it was a probe or am i just crazy? but she heard it too, and so did the dogs!!
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Second encounter after april 1996 nevada encounter...Some months later

content.detailedDescription: On new years eve 2011 around 2045 i was enjoying a backyard campfire with friends.  the sky was very clear and we are in the flight pattern for a flight school in the area, so there are always small planes flying.  on this particular night i had not seen any planes, which i assumed was because of the holiday.  i was sitting facing south, when in the corner of my eye i saw movement in the sky.  i turned to look and there was a bright orange fire ball moving steadily and silently across the sky in an arch. it had no trail, no sound, no edges, and no changes, but it was glowing.  i watched it until it went out of sight into the tree line.  i didnt say anything to the friends i was with.  i thought it was a chinese/japenese lantern made somewhat like a hot air balloon, as i have seen on tv.  i continued on with my evening and about 45 minutes later it was back, going in the same path opposite direction as before. this time i said something to the group, and we all agreed it look like a lantern.  i am a firefighter, who lives by the kennedy space center and have never seen anything like this before.  as the sister of  a pilot i am always looking up in the sky, and any movement catches my eye.  the eerie part of this was the lack of sound.
content.summary: A slient fire ball that went from east to west, about an hour later came back in same flight path from west to east and 45 minutes later on the same path opposite direction

content.detailedDescription:
i was on my way to visit a friend in my car,and was within 250 yards of our meeting venue he was sat in his car  while stationary.
 i was travelling about 25mph and suddenly noticed this orange light in a clear night sky moving towards me at about 0640 hours.
 it caught my attention because of its colour and appeared to be a short beem or tunnel of light and was accompanied by a second same colour object  both to the left of the upper section of my windscreen. 
at first site i thought it to be an aircraft,but the lights were dull orange and i live within 2 miles of a major airline  and know the lighting mechanics of these
 it only lasted a 20 seconds as they came directly over the left of the vehical, and i was trying to strain to see and slowed down to veiw them without causing a danger to other traffic users,which  on looking into my rear veiw mirror was  0 
on meeting with my friend ,he immediatly spoke of what he saw from his parked vehical ,and noted that there were 4 object to his veiw, he was sitting at 90 degrese to the lights,parked in a church gateway and had a more pararamic view then i,he stated they had the colour of orange. 
the objects were not visable on contacting my friend as we were now looking into the direction they were moving and the street lighting obscured our veiw of the night sky.  
i reckon that they were travelling in a southerly direction,at a moderate speed.
content.summary: a short   tunnel of orange light

content.detailedDescription: Leaving indiana on my way back to phily scare as hell !!!!!What happens was that it was on one side of the van then it came toward us and it whent to the otherside of the van quick i got scare when it came toward me so i jump and tryed to get film on other side of the van window. we were in shock!!!!
content.summary: Ufo caught on tape

content.detailedDescription:
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

ufo sighting sherman oaks, ca filmed by eric adamo new years 12:06am corner of allott & chandler. there were 3, one after the other. the 1st one i didnt film, the 2nd one is this video and the 3rd one i had in my view finder, but all i got was a blank sky. the aliens must have been blocking me from filming it!!

to the naked eye, it was the dark eerie red the same as i saw in july and of course bigger. the noise in the background is noise from passing cars on chandler. the ufo was silent, made no noise. it came from the north heading south, low on the horizon then went straight up to astronomical altitudes as you can see in the video.
content.summary: Red orange orb

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 9:30p.M. traveling east bound hwy 40. i noticed a pulsating red light that i thought was an airplane.  moving south to north. i did no more than blink. the object had moved straight backward along what seemed to be a straight line. this object was directly forward of my line of sight while looking out the windshield first. after it moved, i had to turn my head where my chin was over my left clavicle. the object hovered for a split second. it then moved toward me covering what would seem a great distance in a matter of seconds. it banked toward the hwy crossing the river. approaching me, i hunched over the steering wheel and slowed down because it was moving fast. i saw a black triangular shaped craft. it was this shape that the red and blue lights made. it was non-reflective to any external lighting from the highway lights. the lights did not shine but were of a softy glow.  i got such a adrenalin rush to what i was seeing that tears came to my eyes. i had to tell someone. i looked around and there were no other cars or trucks around me or coming from the other direction.  i almost was as if this thing knew it. and was not afraid to show itself to me.  i lost track of it because it flew directly over my vehicle.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black triangle shape with two red and 1 blue light, non-reflective surface

content.detailedDescription: Having a conversation about ufo's with a fellow i work with recently and he told about an event that happened at date specified above, near los olivos california, santa barbara county.  this was this guy's wedding reception so he knew exact date and time.  lot of witnesses, including his father who, until he retired, was the pilot for the governor of south dakota.  his father told my friend "what i saw can't be done by traditional aircraft."  told my friend i would contact you and ask if you had similar reports on that date in that location.
content.summary: Group of objects flying, hovering, grouping, separating in night sky

content.detailedDescription: Having a conversation about ufo's with a fellow i work with recently and he told about an event that happened at date specified above, near los olivos california, santa barbara county.  this was this guy's wedding reception so he knew exact date and time.  lot of witnesses, including his father who, until he retired, was the pilot for the governor of south dakota.  his father told my friend "what i saw can't be done by traditional aircraft."  told my friend i would contact you and ask if you had similar reports on that date in that location.
content.summary: Group of objects flying, hovering, grouping, separating in night sky

content.detailedDescription: At about 7:30pm, i was standing on our deck (wooden structure)looking at venus low on horizon, and looked up and saturn was slightly to right of straight up. i called my wife dawn to have a look as they were so bright. as i pointed out saturn, we both saw the materialisation of a very large boomerang shaped flying vehicle. i suspect it to have been at a height of 25000 feet (i served in airforce, so i have a good eye for heights). if my estimate is right, then the vehicle must have been in excess of 5 kilometers wide! it was definitely not an aircraft. the vehicle was surrounded in a luminous white light, and the material of the vehicle was not easily identifiable - just looked dark silvery (could be the low light and height). it had blue and red lights showing two blue and one red. it faded into sight (the air was very clear - not a cloud or vapour in sight), and moved at a speed i'd judge as about 1,500 km/hour for a distance of approximately 75 kilometers, then faded out to nothing. my wife could not believe her eyes. i have seen other craft before over the years. this observation was too quick for me to get a camera to photograph it, so the report is only verbal. i commented earlier to my wife that the air had a peculiar vibration, but cannot say if the two were connected in any way - it was just strange that there was this vibration in the air that was quite distinct for about an hour before our sighting.
content.summary: Huge boomerang shape spotted just off angle of saturn - witnessed by 2

content.detailedDescription: I live on a lake under a set of mountains just west of mt. baker south/southeast of bellingham washington reed lake/cain lake. i walked out to my porch which i frequent often, and it faces west looking over the lake up to the mountains. on the top of the mountain just at tree line were three balls of light, clearly larger then any star. being a helicopter pilot, and knowing the specific routes flying over my house i new these lights were not a plane. also i no for a fact there is no tower or structure that would be on top of the mountain there... the lights were in a triangle formation for about a minute or two. then they slowly formed a straight line with a little space in between the three. blinked three times, or pulsated three times and dissapeared...  i was left with a amazing feeling of joy and wonder. during the event i was stuck stareing at the lights, not able to break away and grab my camera which would of been the first thing i normally would of done?  after i came inside and told my girlfriend hesitantly. she could tell i felt wierd.
content.summary: Three balls of light in triangle formation, then floated into straight line and pulsated.

content.detailedDescription: I can only quest what is on picture. i can whit adobe photoshop make some change that see better what is on picture. if somebody else take picture in some days like i it will be good. if can somebody get video from parliament in budapest or some near building?
content.summary: I'm foto ufo, but i see object on picture next day, i didn't see in real time.

content.detailedDescription: Saw four laser like lights. looking into the northern night sky saw four laser like lights instantly appear going east to west. lights were in two enemy spaced pairs with a larger space between the two pairs.  no object was noted the lines were simply there vivid red then faded away.
content.summary: 4 red laser like lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was wide awake and walking out to my vehicle to respond to a structure fire at 1:23am and noticed a very large slow moving cigar shaped craft that was moving very slow right above the tree tops, no more than 300 to 400 feet away from me and made no sound. the sky was clear and the moon was almost full, so when i grabbed my night vision gen3 monocle it was hard to see the craft clearly, but i could see no wings only the fuselage. the body of the craft or fuselage was abnormally long and appeared to be at least twice the length of any aircraft i've ever seen and i've dealt with many different aircraft as i was once in the usaf's crash rescue team. it did not have standard aircraft light markings, its lights seemed backwards... the red blinking/pulsating light was on the front and it had 2 white dimmer lights on the rear. within a minute it was across my yard and into a very large open field area and as i left my house en route to the emergency call i looked to my left across the field and it was gone. it should have been very visible at the slow speed it traveled which was almost a hover or landing speed.

 i have seen many military aircraft over the years and emergency medical life flights come over my house very low, but nothing like this and you can hear them for miles, this thing was silent. also no other aircraft in the area.
content.summary: Cigar shape slow moving above tree tops

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to mcdonalds on fourth plain (travelling west).(around 9:38 or 10:00pm. travelling on davis road, i looked out of my window (front) and notice above the tree line a orange orb sitting there. it wasn't moving or doing anything strange. at first i thought it was a shop light from someones house until it started to pulse and then it seemed to change(in an explosive way) into a much larger orb. i've never seen anything so large in my life. at first i was amazed then a strong urge of fear set in. i was staring at it and a house got in my visual sight and when i passed the house it was gone.
content.summary: Drive by sighting.

content.detailedDescription: Not much to say.  just looked out the window and saw this object.  sun was setting and to the north east out of my bedroom window saw this odd object.  oval (blimp shaped) with lights on each end flashing on and off.  could make out shape against the darkening skies.  flew in straight line until was out of range of sight from my window.
content.summary: Oval object with flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: While driving north between pisgah and murfreesboro, arkansas, i noticed orangish ball/sphere shaped object at least 1 mile high traveling south. my brother and i stopped the vehicle and got out and watched it continue south and then disappear within a blink of an eye. sighting lasted aprox 2 mins.
content.summary: Ufo followed straight path then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling from i75 and got on sr 44 in the deland, fl area heading east to go home to ponce inlet, fl. i had just gotten off the phone with my partner, and past through a green light where i notice a ploiceman parked off the road where sr44 crossed it. he was off to the left, with his lights off. the light was gree, so i proceeded. around the 1 st bend of the road i noticed 3 deer all looked like does. then the raod curved a couple of time and became straightened. it has been only about 2 mins since i crossed the green light area. i on approach to the light i was going 70mph but slowed down to 60 mph when i saw the police. then sped up to 70mph. so when i past the light my radio was off windows up no sound. this object flew right over the driver's side of the car. less than 50 feet off the ground . it was moving about 80mph . i noticed the large white light in the back of it, (it was not that bright) and it had a large red light on top. it was black or very very dark grey, i noticed it cause the moon shined on it when it turn a little  in front of me, by this time it was less than 50 yard from the card keeping distance. the side of it looked like a bunch of entangled piping, it was 30ft no mor than 50ft long cylandracal cigar shape, ther was nothing smooth on the surface from what i saw. it sped up and moved to the left side of the road and then the right. soon it was hovering over the woods to my right and then it moved quickly to the left side of the car again. then it looked as though it slowed down and was heading back to me, then it went to the left again heading to the city and it hoovered there for a moment and crossed the road to the right. by this time it was right over the treetops. it looked as though it was about to land. i could not follow it any longer.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving home and it flew right over the car. less than 50 feet from the ground.

content.detailedDescription: It was me and my daughter in the car, driving northbound i-5 through a darkened quarter between ferndale and the border when we noticed a bright multicolored light in the sky. its structure almost appeared as a screen, but also appeared as a cluster of 4 orbs but maintained formation. light and color passed across these orbs or screen without ever blinking off. it emitted colors of red,orange, bright blue, white, and green. sometimes more than one color appearing at once. we watched it get closer in the sky to us, almost hovering at the same altitude while moving across the sky. never seen anything like this and we have a lot of aircraft flying around patrolling the border. this was not a canadian/us border patrol or a plane. only thing similar ive ever seen to it was on "ufo's best evidence ever caught". there has been a lot of weird lights around her lately... don't know what to think about a lot of them.
content.summary: Bright vivid pulsing multicolored object

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were coming back from d.C on 85south and my wife was taking pictures threw the car w/tint, of the sun & clouds.When we looked at the pictures later we saw two objects directly above the sun.
content.summary: 85south my wife was taking pictures threw the car w/tint of the sun & clouds.When we looked at the pictures later we saw two objects directly above the sun..

content.detailedDescription: On jan. 11, 2012 i went into my backyard with my dogs at 6:52am so they could do their business. i always look up into the sky looking for planes or possibly a ufo. i never was lucky enough to see anything until this morning. i was looking in the eastern sky and saw what i thought was a star at first. then i noticed it was moving in a southeast direction. so i thought it was a plane, but it didn't have any port or starboard lights. it had been moving for about 6 to 7 seconds when all of a sudden it changed into a very big glowing orb. the size change was about 20 times its orignal size when i first saw it. it was still heading southeast when it disappeared. the whole sighting lasted 15 - 20 seconds. i kept watching for a while after that. but it never re-appeared. it was the most exciting expirence i've ever had except for when i was in the navy in the south china sea gulf of tonkin in 1973. that's when i saw my first ufo. i had been trained to spot all kinds of planes and i was on watch between 00:00 and 04:00. i spotted a bright white light doing a zig zag pattern then it shot across the sky zig zaged again and shot back where it had started and then shot off into space and disappeared. that's why i know what i saw was not a plane on jan. 11, 2012
content.summary: I saw a star like object at first then it became a large glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: I had arrived home from work in the evening, i was in my driveway at approx. 6:15 p.M.,when i observed two very bright lights at very high altitude. i often see satellites in the sky because i live in a rural area with no city lights. this looked almost like that, but two large, very prominant lights. they did not blink, just traveling along, then reducing to only one light of the same size. the single light traveled for a few more seconds and vanished.I waited to hear sounds from a jet, but heard nothing. it was only seconds after it vanished that i saw what i would usually see, a satellite cruising the sky. usually i see only one satellite every few nights. this night i observed two satellites, cruising at different angles, just after seeing the odd lights. i know this couldnt have been a satellite, but it was also too high to be landing beacons on a plane.  the odd lights were near where the satellites would have crossed paths.
content.summary: Saw 2 white lights reduce to 1 at very high altitude,then obseved 2 sats
